c:capability.name: Vent
c:capability.c:description: Model of a louvered air vent device.

c:attribute.name: ventstate
c:attribute.description: Reflects the current state of the vent. Obstruction implying that something is preventing the opening or closing of the vent.

c:attribute.name: level
c:attribute.description: Reflects the current level of openness, as a percentage.
